product.__mappingTitle: NEW CUSTOMER (same promos as BTS over Sky)
product.banner_text: Snap up your BT TV loyalty discount today
product.package_1_header: Renew now and get our exclusive sport, entertainment and kids channels
product.package_1_sales_message: Includes 24 HD channels for a crystal clear picture
product.package_1_bp_1: Enjoy 55 premium entertainment channels, 10 kids channels and 24 in HD
product.package_1_bp_2: Record up to 300 hours of your favourite telly
product.package_1_bp_3: Pause and rewind live TV with our recordable YouView+ HD box
product.package_1_bp_4: Catch up on the latest channels on the go with the BT TV app
product.package_1_bp_5: Buy and rent the latest films and box sets on the BT TV Store
product.package_1_bp_6: Watch BT Sport on BT TV, online and on the app
product.package_1_legals:
Entertainment Extra HD TV Pack.

Prices and content may change at any time during the contract. Separate contracts apply to BT Broadband, BT TV and BT Sport.

You'll need BT Broadband. Existing broadband customers must have 24 months remaining on your contract, if not, you'll need to re-contract your broadband. Availability of digital channels and quality of content depends on local transmitter and suitable rooftop aerial (www.freeview.co.uk/availability). Â£20 charge for broadband extenders, if necessary. HDMI connection required. Payment by direct debit. Minimum line speed required to watch the live AMC channel and BT Sport. A 10m cable will be provided.

Subject to availability. Terms apply.
